name: Nikola Tesla
description: A brilliant inventor enlisted to create a machine for Robert Angier.

content.title: Background
content.body: Nikola Tesla is an inventor and electrical engineer, known for his pioneering work in electricity. In *The Prestige*, Tesla is living and working in Colorado Springs, where he continues his experiments on wireless energy transmission.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Tesla is depicted as an eccentric and visionary scientist with a passion for pushing the boundaries of science. He is deeply invested in his work and largely indifferent to the politics and practices of the business world.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Tesla serves as a crucial figure in the narrative of *The Prestige*. He is hired by Robert Angier to create a machine capable of producing a teleportation effect for Angier's magic act. Tesla's machine ultimately produces unexpected and transformative results.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Nikola Tesla has a complex professional relationship with Robert Angier, who enlists his help in building a machine for his act. He also has a rival in Thomas Edison, mentioned as a competitor in the world of invention and electricity.

content.title: Abilities
content.body: Tesla is a masterful inventor and engineer, particularly skilled in the field of electrical engineering and pioneering in wireless energy transfer. His work in *The Prestige* involves creating a machine with seemingly magical capabilities.
